永葆青春？化学鸡尾酒被证明可有效逆转细胞年龄研究人员发现了可以逆转细胞衰老的化学药物组合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Eternal-youth-Chemical-cocktails-prove- effective-in-cell-age-reversal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Eternal-youth-Chemical-cocktails-prove- effective-in-cell-age-reversal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd0cec5d-d1e6-443f-87d5-37cdfdb0b0b2 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 07:58:00 -0400 Eternal youth? Chemical cocktails prove effective in cell age reversal

一旦新的非处方避孕药上市，费用和承保范围如何？上周，FDA 批准了 Opill，这是第一种每日口服避孕药，将在商店柜台和网上出售。生殖健康倡导者称赞这一突破性的批准可以帮助数百万人避免怀孕，而在美国近一半的情况下怀孕是无意的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Once-the-new-over-the-counter-birth-control-pill-is-available-What-about-cost-and-coverage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Once-the-new-over-the-counter-birth-control-pill-is-available-What-about-cost-and-coverage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d09b491a-7e91-4a69-83f0-65b4ff8c469f Wed, 19 Jul 2023 06:32:52 -0400 Once the new over-the-counter birth control pill is available, What about cost and coverage?
